title: Ka duh tu dang mah an awm lo
lyrics:
Khawvel tuifinriat zauvah hian,
Lungngaihnaten min tuam vel a;
Aw, min kai rawh ka chhandamtu,
Buaina chhum ten min chim lai hian.

Aw, Lal Isu, nang chauh lo chu,
Vanah khianin tu nge ka neih?
Leiah pawh hianin nang lo chu,
Ka duh tu dang mah an awm lo.

En teh Lalpa, kan lenna hi,
Buai leh thimna r√¢l lo lianin;
Thlamuanna hmun reng a awm lo,
I ram tiam ka thlen hma hi zawng.

Lei lungngaih zan thim hnuaiah hian,
I ram tiam chu min thlir tir la;
Lei lungngaihna min tuamtu hi,
Lungawi takin ka pal dai ang.
